name: Airhart Aeronautics
headline: Airplanes anyone can fly
description: Airhart is making airplanes anyone can fly. Our semi-autonomous tech will enable 10x more people to fly their own planes and make flying to Tahoe as easy as driving to the grocery store

founders.name: Brendan Quinn, Founder
founders.description: Brendan Quinn is a co-founder of Airhart Aeronautics. He previously spent 4 years at Apple working on the A10 through A15 Bionic, M1, M2. He managed a team responsible for the simulators & emulators of Apple's future chips. Brendan previously ran a team at Cornell building autonomous search and rescue aircraft and is also a pilot.

founders.name: Nikita Ermoshkin, Founder
founders.description: Nikita Ermoshkin is an electrical and systems engineer with a degree in Electrical and Computer Engineering from Cornell University. Nikita was an avionics systems engineer at SpaceX, where he worked on Falcon 9 Fairing recovery, Falcon 9 Payload design, Falcon 9 Stage 2 avionics, and several other projects. Prior to SpaceX and Cornell, Nikita was a co-founder and systems architect at Carbon, where he worked on the development of Carbon's 3D printing technology and printer architecture.

# Flying
# made
# safe
# for
# first-time aviators
# weekend trips
# avoiding traffic
# first-time aviators
Scroll to experience the future of flight
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6401c0c2b6c95fc0966d39e9/66785293bc9e35b163859d72_Downwards_Seperator.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6401c0c2b6c95fc0966d39e9/667854c9da68c8264abbca0e_Chair_Right.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6401c0c2b6c95fc0966d39e9/667854c9da68c8264abbca0e_Chair_Right.png)
## Our Goal is Simple
##### Build a plane anyone can safely fly.
We believe the freedom of flying is an unparalleled experience that everyone deserves access to. That’s why we redesigned the cockpit entirely around the pilot to make it safer than any other airplane.
[Learn about the Plane](https://www.airhartaero.com/</airhart-sling>)
## Freedom of Flight for Everyone
The power of flight is intoxicating, but it’s hard to imagine being your own pilot if you have never flown before.
[Watch THE TEASER](https://www.airhartaero.com/<https:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=JRL0fCBzubw>)
The Freedom of Flight
0:49
## Everything we make starts with three fundamentals
1
#### Safety without compromise
Our fault-tolerant fly-by-wire controls and avionics are designed and built by SpaceX avionics engineers who delivered the most reliable rockets in the world.
2
#### Making your world smaller
Every system we create aims to reduce the workload on the pilot so that going farther and faster feels as easy as a quick trip to the grocery store.
3
#### Modern and intuitive avionics
Our hardware and software are designed from the ground up using state-of-the-art UI/UX technology to create beautiful avionics displays that are intuitive to use.
## Our Investors
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6401c0c2b6c95fc0966d39e9/667dbf8902c24a23e1e5efc3_L2.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6401c0c2b6c95fc0966d39e9/667dbf993b1fec453d35cf68_YComb.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6401c0c2b6c95fc0966d39e9/667dbf917b1d2b2af7507320_Soma.png)
## Experience the Revolution in Personal Aviation
We are collecting fully refundable $1000 deposits to reserve a production slot in our first round of orders. Schedule a call with our Sales Team today to learn more and book a demo flight.
[Preorder Now](https://www.airhartaero.com/<https:/buy.stripe.com/6oE9EC1sD5Lw4Jq144>)[Questions? Get in Touch](https://www.airhartaero.com/</contact>)
*The full price of the Airhart Sling pre-tax is $500,000 with availability predicted for January of 2026. This purchase secures a production slot in the limited first manufacture of the aircraft.
#### Follow Us
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6401c0c2b6c95fc0966d39e9/64cd7767f38de2cef769d677_Instagram.png)](https://www.airhartaero.com/<https:/www.instagram.com/airhartaero/>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6401c0c2b6c95fc0966d39e9/64cd7766a2a6884f7983b1d0_YouTube.png)](https://www.airhartaero.com/<https:/www.youtube.com/channel/UCd5j5WBnNT5bfkq-NVrza8g>)
#### Stay Up to Date
Keep in the loop on the latest news and events from us including launch status, new products, and more.

generated_description:
Airhart Aeronautics has a straightforward but ambitious mission: to make flying as accessible as driving a car. Founded in 2022 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S22, this innovative startup is headquartered in Long Beach, California, with a lean team of six employees spearheading the initiative.

At the heart of Airhart’s vision is their cutting-edge aircraft, designed with semi-autonomous technology that simplifies piloting and enhances safety. This tech aims to empower ten times more people to take to the skies. Imagine flying to Tahoe without the hassle of traffic—Airhart is making that possible by creating an airplane anyone can confidently pilot.

Safety is paramount for Airhart. Their aircraft employs fault-tolerant fly-by-wire controls, developed by engineers from SpaceX, ensuring reliability akin to the most trusted rockets on the market. The cockpit is built with the pilot’s experience in mind, ensuring that flying feels intuitive and straightforward. The team believes everyone deserves the freedom of flight, and they are committed to reducing the workload for pilots, making long-distance journeys feel effortless.

Airhart is currently pre-selling their flagship model, the Airhart Sling, priced at $500,000 (pre-tax), with aircraft availability projected for January 2026. Interested buyers can secure a production slot with a fully refundable deposit of $1,000. 

If you're curious about flying your own plane or want to stay updated on Airhart’s journey, you can check out their website [here](https://www.airhartaero.com/). With Airhart Aeronautics, the sky isn't just the limit—it’s a realm everyone can explore.
